catalyst: The photocatalyst itself acts as the catalyst in the experiment. Specifically, the text mentions GCN and GCN510 as examples of the photocatalysts used.
co_catalyst: No co-catalysts were used in the experiment, as stated in the text: "No co-catalysts or sacrificial agents were used."
operation mode: The experiment utilizes both Batch and Continuous operation modes, as indicated by the phrase 'Batch/Continuous' in the provided selections.
